website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch belt features a slim design and may help prevent hernia recurrence.
pros: Consists of a cotton blend fabric that is lightweight, breathable, and moisture-wicking
Slim design ensures you can wear the belt comfortably for an extended period of time
Offers a great option for individuals who require a belt to support the stomach muscles following hernia surgery
cons: Belt is less durable than many comparable options
Hook-and-loop tape tends to wear down quickly

customer_reviews.title: The top and bottom of the belt are fraying and ...
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom of the belt are fraying and the internal material is coming through. It is prickly and makes the belt extremely uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sagacity

customer_reviews.title: Helps to recover quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbilical hernia belt after delivery of my baby in order to support stomach muscles. It really helped me to recover quickly! The belt is very durable and flexible. Material is breathable (very important because I wore it during hot summer months) and lightweight. Completely satisfied with my purchase! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works well, it runs a bit small although with the stretch it is tolerable. It is a bit hard to line the Velcro up so that it isn't scratching all day and also hard to do alone since it attaches in the back. Kind of wish it attached on the side.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It is an well made piece of fabric
customer_reviews.text: I have a Midline Hernia which is about 3 inches long and I was hoping that I could use this item to keep the hernia from Bulging as I did sit ups at the gym... But no,,, I had to buy an additional 4 inch thick rolled up and wide Ace Bandage which I stuff in between my body and the pad on the belt and it works great........
customer_reviews.author: eddie s.

customer_reviews.title: ORTONYX Umbilical Navel Hernia Belt for Men and Women/Abdominal Support Binder with Compression Pad (Black, Large-XXL)/ACHB5241
customer_reviews.text: A little snugger than I thought it would be.. and where it fastens is very irritating to my husband's skin.. I have to put a piece of soft fabric under where it fastens to keep it from scratching my husband's skin open.
customer_reviews.author: C. Travers

customer_reviews.title: Just not right! :(
customer_reviews.text: Most decent belts allow you to simply wrap around and velcro the belt from the front. This has to be attached from the rear and if you do not have another person helping you velcro it from the "rear" you have to lay it on a floor or bed and then lay on it and attach from the front. Then struggle to get up off the bed or floor and try to turn the belf to the rear so the Padded area is covering your hernia! This is a horrible product! I have had other belt over the years and 2 hernias and this is absolutely the worst one ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Black

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many hernia belts after major abdominal surgeries (including hernia). This one is breathable, thin enough to wear under a looser shirt; I wear a T shirt under it for comfort. It doesn't roll or hit me in the ribs (female, about 5'5", 145, got a L, M probably would have been fine). Provides a lot of relief; wish I'd been advised to wear one BEFORE hernia developed. Some users object to it's closure being in the back; it can be turned around, placing closure in front. The attached pressure pad is velcro-backed and can be moved as well. I'd recommend this brand and style over any other tried.
customer_reviews.author: Coby Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: My waist size is on the low end of the range for the L-XXL so that's what I got and it's way too loose to be useful. I also feel it's made of low-quality material. Looking at the instructions, there are misspellings and poor grammar - it's nearly unintelligible, so it appears this product isn't made for the American market - not a good sign. I would not recommend buying this belt.
customer_reviews.author: DocHeller

customer_reviews.title: It helped to keep the pain down while working in my yard.
customer_reviews.text: I wore the belt for a few hours doing yard work, and I have to say, it really helped to keep the pain away. Even later that night, no pain. But it is hard to adjust to a good fit from the back. The side would have been better. Also not soft enough for skin contact, had to ware a T shirt under it. That was not to comfortable and very hot after a while. Over all, I will use it as much as I can.
customer_reviews.author: S L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would really work, but so far it keeping my hernia in place. Since the items closure is in back, it can be a little tricky getting the velcro aligned, though it gets easier with some practice. It does cover my herniated area, and despite the initial pressure of a band around my body, at the end of the first day I actually forgot I was wearing it until I took an evening shower.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This belt made it possible for me to keep working before umbilical hernia repair, and it made recovery much easier. It kept the hernia from getting worse before it was repaired, and keeping compression on the surgery site after repair greatly lessened pain during recovery. I even slept with it on sometimes Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: It worked til the day it came apart after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one for my husband after purchasing a cheaper one that failed. This one worked better. The elastic held the course. All went well until the fabric cover over the round disc that presses against the hernia pulled away from the disc, rendering the whole thing useless as the disc won't stay in place. My husband wore it for 12+ hours a day and leads an active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: An Ru

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This belt is very well made. I find the piece for over the belly button a little too hard for me. The concept and the make is well constructed I am trying to get use to it. It will do the job. Material is light and lets air through much nicer to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Stock

customer_reviews.title: Velcro scratches skin
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this higher except for the fact that they placed the velcro on in the most uncomfortable way possible. Seriously what genius thought placing the hard plastic hooks in towards the skin and the soft loops out was a good idea? Other than that it seems fine. Not great. Not terrible. Just okay.
customer_reviews.author: carbon-based life form

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product yields with your body and there is no pinching or stiffness to the sides when you sit. The compression pad is very, very study, so it holds the hernia or stoma in place.
customer_reviews.author: Joan BW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This Hernia belt is my second attempt to alleviate my problem and this one really; works.." "Thank You,...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable All Day
customer_reviews.text: You have to make sure that when you stretch the fabric that it attaches exactly aligned, otherwise the velcro that is sticking out will aggravate your skin. It is a very well made product, just pay attention to the alignment when you put it on so you are not bothered later.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This belt has become an asset to my ongoing health, keeping an umbilical intact while I wait for possible surgery.
customer_reviews.author: ghgloryseeker

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was really tight no matter how I adjusted it. Spent good part of a whole day at work trying to get it adjusted but it always felt like a corset just squeezing you to death. It was so uncomfortable after just one day I didn't see a need for using it again, returning it, I would appreciate getting my money back and perhaps trying something else.. Not recommended if you dont like tight fitting garments.
customer_reviews.author: c.j

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt. It provides a steady support, yet its not very stiff - it's a comfortable support. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have a ventral hernia that I’m not able to have surgical repair for at this time due to chemo schedule. My surgeon told me to buy a truss. Once I pop the hernia back in this belt holds it in place. It’s also kind of comfortable too. Not too bad in terms of compression.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: support binder
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I have a hernia or whatever the bulge is in my abdomen. I had colon cancer surgery in Sept of 2016.
customer_reviews.author: merryg481

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has felt good and hasn’t aggravated the hernia. Usually when I put something tight I start hurting all over my abdomen and back.. I will write a follow status in the future if I see any difference then.
customer_reviews.author: brenda l. moreno

customer_reviews.title: Provided support as expected
customer_reviews.text: This belt provides excellent support and allows my husband to do more physical activities without worrying about his umbilical hernia. According to him it helps improve his abdominal muscle tone.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Practical belt
customer_reviews.text: Like the amount of support it gives to your hernia spot. However needs to wear a light tank top underneath it cause it’s not as soft to wraparound unprotected skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very small! I purchased this product for a family member who is a large and the product was too small on the biggest setting so i tried to my self and the product is still too small... I am a medium and the large could not fit me. I would not recommend unless you have a very tight waist.
customer_reviews.author: Arian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. After few days of wearing it my back stopped hurting. I have problems with my lower back, so this belt helps me to relax it
customer_reviews.author: Vladlena O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. I’ve been using it almost every day and it has offered great support for my umbilical hernia and has also helped in reducing the size. While it will never fiully heal using just the belt it definitely has helped dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: English, Please
customer_reviews.text: I imagine the belt works properly. I ordered it for a friend. However, there were no instructions in English, only foreign languages... Umm, could you include English in that?
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 months and it's reduced worst pain by 95%. Usual pain at 0 - 2% of before. After a couple of days of getting used to it, now it's off my mind and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Abundance

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best hernia belt I have had!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several abd. belts and this is the only belt that had a firm cone that kept my abdominal hernia in place. I purchased a second belt a few days after wearing the first belt. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't last
customer_reviews.text: The belt saved me for the many months waiting for surgery. 6 weeks to go, but the belt couldn't last that long. We had to stitch up the cover over the hard plate after 3 months. Having the Velcro in back is inconvenient and scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth B. Dolby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality. No longer scared to sneeze or cough
customer_reviews.text: Been using two weeks and all is good. If it doesn't hold up I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Compression disc hard
customer_reviews.text: The belt itself is comfortable and provides support. The compression disc is uncomfortable and causes discomfort to use, as it is too rigid and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lanman

customer_reviews.title: Gives me the relief I need
customer_reviews.text: I use while sleeping. I was nervous about twisting and turning while I slept. The belt allowed me to get a full nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Albertjohn

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro closure is at the back, making it very difficult to apply to your own body. Even wearing it over a T-shirt the closure still irritate your skin
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with what was thought to be an umbilical hernia. This belt helped with a lot of the pain from moving
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Would be easier if somehow it fastened i. Front or sides not the back. Was as described snd is working well. More comfortable than wide band Dr issued.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it might not last, it will just depend on how long you’ll need it
customer_reviews.text: Yes this does work. Yes I do recommend it. But be aware. It will start to curl at the edges and will need to be replaced, depending on how it fits. I’ve got a bit of extra weight, like most people that eould need this product. The fact that they use a fitness model for this must be a joke? A finess model wouldn’t have a hernia that is usually brought on from lack of physical fitness.
customer_reviews.author: BostonDad22

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! I purchased this umbilical hernia belt after delivery of my babies in order to support stomach muscles. It really helped me to recover quickly! Completely satisfied with my purchase! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Kaprelova

customer_reviews.title: Its actually helping
customer_reviews.text: This belt was purchased for my husband and he is very satisfied. It not only is a good fit and comfortable but it allows him to do the work that needs to be done without causing more damage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Weyandt

customer_reviews.title: nice well sized
customer_reviews.text: I use to and abdominal hernia - works well but needs to go over cloth due to the inside velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stolzenberger

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband is quite satisfied with this support. Fits him well and has quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just had surgery and needed something for work. This product works great and is easily hidden underneath clothing. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasio

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything go compare this to, but I've had it for a few months and it is still working great, the elastic is still strong, and there are different settings to change the tightness, but it will still stretch as you move. There is a small learning curve putting it on, but easy once you do it 4 or 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: JackL

customer_reviews.title: Filling better
customer_reviews.text: Real good one. I’m filling more better when I’m using it. Good quality of material.
customer_reviews.author: Reddan

customer_reviews.title: It works great !!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product it works very well with the silicone pad !! AAA+++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Coolhandluke

customer_reviews.title: MUST MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its incredible the instant relief I get the moment its strapped on... Comfort depends on your body type and weight... I'm a size 36 so I barely fit into it but after some time I forget I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best product at the best price
customer_reviews.text: Far better than similar belts from medical supply stores at 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. V. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Has been holding in my umbelical hernia well while awaiting surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Aud

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's much more comfortable than I thought it would be. Although it's not intended to be a back brace, the support feels good.

customer_reviews.title: Wish that it was a little more comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay, and it does help with what it suppose to, just wish that it was a little more comfortable in which I think it could be.

customer_reviews.title: not satified
customer_reviews.text: the pad came apart after hand washing. Needs to be replaced. I just received the 2nd belt different model and notice that the pad with it appears to be made better and hopefully will last longer. If the pad had not come apart would have rated 5 stars. Product is unusable now. How do I get replaced?
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend that needed some relief from a hernia she had.She said the relief was indescribable
customer_reviews.author: Donovansnana

customer_reviews.title: This helped
customer_reviews.text: This is a good belt. Does what it is supposed to do.

customer_reviews.title: Order this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear after his hernia surgery (3 hernias). He had instant relief when we put it on. I received this the day after surgery, but within 3 days of using it he was off pain medicine and back to moving around more normal. Without this, he felt like he had to constantly hold his stomach.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Provides outstanding support to my brother’s hernia. Easy to put on and comfortable to wear. Strongly recommend it.

customer_reviews.author: James l Hubbard

product_meta.title: ORTONYX Umbilical Hernia Belt for Men and Women - Abdominal Support Binder with Compression Pad - Navel Ventral Epigastric Incisional and Belly Button Hernias Surgery Prevention Aid (Large-XXL)
product_meta.description:
Size:Large/2X-Large| Color:Black

The umbilical hernia belt is designed to provide support for umbilical hernia before surgery, or as an alternative to surgical treatment for reducible hernias. The belt can also be worn after post surgery to support the stomach muscles and protect the incision site, thus speeding up recovery and lowering the chances of recurring hernia.

The belt is made of durable, lightweight, and flexible elastic cotton blend material, which is breathable and moisture wicking for increased comfort, thermoregulation, and moisture control. The properties of the fabric allow it to provide gentle compression and support, and adapt to the shape of the body without causing discomfort or rolling down.

The umbilical hernia truss features a removable anatomically concave silicone pad, which provides localized pressure on the hernia. The pad is lined with soft fabric for added comfort and is secured with hook & loop closure, allowing to remove the pad or place it anywhere on the belt.

Hook & loop fastening of the truss ensures easy on and off and customized adjustment of compression and fit.

The slimline design of the belt allows to wear it for extended periods of time under regular clothes.

Due to its innovative features, the umbilical hernia belt offers instant pain relief and ensures stable support for the hernia site, promoting the healing process in a faster and more comfortable way and preventing recurrence.

Measure waist circumference to determine size:

S-M: 28.3”-35.8”

L-XXL: 35.8”-49.2”
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE HERNIA SUPPORT: Recommended for hernia support before and after surgery, or as an alternative to surgical treatment for reducible hernias. Designed to help with Umbilical, Incisional, Epigastric, Ventral, or Inguinal Hernias , abdominal contusions or protrusions.

HIGH QUALITY BREATHABLE MATERIAL: Durable, lightweight, breathable, medical grade, moisture-wicking elastic cotton blend fabric that keeps the body cool everyday, dry and comfortable, and provides stability without restricting movement.
SLIM DESIGN: Slimline design and the ease of on and off allow to wear the hernia truss for extended periods of time under regular clothes.

INNOVATIVE FEATURES FOR MAXIMIZED EFFECT: The construction of the fabric allows the belt to conform to the shape of the body and provide comfortable compression. Removable silicon pad with soft lining and an adhesive layer exerts localized pressure on the hernia and can be placed anywhere on the belt. Hook & loop fastening of the truss allows for controlled fit and compression.

INSTANT RELIEF, COMFORT AND RECURRENCE PREVENTION: The umbilical hernia belt offers instant pain relief and ensures stable support for the hernia site, promoting the healing process in a faster and more comfortable way and preventing recurrence.
